name: quicksettings-audio-devices-hider
description: A Gnome Shell extension that allows you to hide selected devices from the Quick Settings audio devices panel

scripts.build: glib-compile-schemas resources/schemas/ && npm run clean:ts && rollup -c
scripts.zip: npm run build:app && rm -rf './dist/quicksettings-audio-devices-hider@marcinjahn.com.zip' && cd ./dist && zip -qr 'quicksettings-audio-devices-hider@marcinjahn.com.zip' .

author: Marcin Jahn <jahnmarcin@outlook.com>
